Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Cabin pressurization rate anomaly. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 10/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
